humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the size of the tumor as 3.2 cm in greatest dimension. Based on the rules provided, a T2 tumor is more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm. Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage of a cancer is determined by the size of the primary tumor. In this report, the size of the primary tumor is stated as 'Greatest dimension (pT) : 3.2 cm. in greatest dimension (pT2)'. Therefore, the T stage is T2.
